content.text:
# The Ultimate Collection (B. B. King album)

| rev2      =
| rev2Score =
}}
The Ultimate Collection is a compilation album by B.B. King, released in 2005.
Track listing
#"Three O'Clock Blues" (from ''Singin' the Blues) – 3:01
#"Please Love Me" (from Singin' the Blues) – 2:48
#"You Upset Me Baby" (from Singin' the Blues) – 3:01
#"Sweet Sixteen" (from The Great B.B. King) – 6:12
#"Rock Me Baby" (from the album of the same name) – 2:58
#"How Blue Can You Get" (from Blues in My Heart) – 2:41
#"Every Day I Have the Blues" (from Singin' the Blues) – 2:41
#"Sweet Little Angel" (from Singin' the Blues'') – 3:46
#"Don't Answer the Door" (from Blues Is King)  – 5:10
#"Paying the Cost to Be the Boss" (from Blues On Top of Blues) – 2:33
#"The Thrill is Gone" (from Completely Well) – 5:25
#"Nobody Loves Me But My Mother" (from Indianola Mississippi Seeds) – 1:26
#"Chains & Things" (w/ Carole King) (from Indianola Mississippi Seeds) – 4:53
#"Ain't Nobody Home" (from Deuces Wild) – 3:14
#"I Like to Live the Love" (from (from To Know You Is To Love You) – 3:17
#"Never Make a Move Too Soon" (from Midnight Believer) – 5:30
#"Better Not Look Down" (from Take It Home) – 3:20
#"There Must Be a Better World Somewhere" (from the album of the same name) – 3:46
#"When Love Comes to Town" (w/ U2) (from Rattle and Hum) – 4:17
#"Ten Long Years" (w/ Eric Clapton) (from Riding with the King) – 4:40
#"I'll Survive" (from Blues on the Bayou) – 4:51
